Tom Emerson wrote:

> I cannot run two Heritrix instances on the same machine now using CVS
> HEAD: the following exception occurs in the log file:
>
> Error: Exception thrown by the agent : 
> java.rmi.server.ExportException: Port already in use: 8849; nested 
> exception is:
>         java.net.BindException: Address already in use

Thats Heritrix starting up the JVM JMX server.  Look in the wrapper 
script.  See how it builds up the JMX args into JMX_OPTS.  Have the 
second use an alternate port or just set the JMX_OPTS to ' ' (Thats a 
space -- empty string don't work... needs to be fixed).
St.Ack

>
> Any clues?
